name: bulma
author: jgthms <bbxdesign@gmail.com>
description: Modern CSS framework based on Flexbox

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-stylus && npm run build-stylus-min
scripts.build-sass: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --output css/ bulma.sass --outFile css/bulma.css
scripts.build-sass-min: node-sass --output-style compressed --source-map true --output css/ bulma.sass css/bulma.min.css
